channel.title: CVE Feed for delabon -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for delabon -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-1325|2024-08-01T18:33:25.570Z -- delabon -- live%20sales%20notification%20for%20woocommerce%20%E2%80%93%20woomotiv
item.description: The Live Sales Notification for Woocommerce – Woomotiv plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.3. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the 'ajax_cancel_review' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to reset the site's review count via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-1325|2024-03-20T06:48:28.425Z -- delabon -- live%20sales%20notification%20for%20woocommerce%20%E2%80%93%20woomotiv
item.description: The Live Sales Notification for Woocommerce – Woomotiv plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.3. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the 'ajax_cancel_review' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to reset the site's review count via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
